sense.name: represent inaccurately; be a poor representation of
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[topic] MISREPRESENT NP2 NOTE: Compare carefully to Sense 2: in Sense 1, NP1 is NOT and agent and does not misrepresent volitionally.
sense.examples: Today's Guardian article misrepresents the views of the Baghdad advisers. The motion picture Titanic misrepresents the social codes of the wealthy. Many of these claims misrepresented the scientific evidence.

sense.name: fake; give a misleading representation of
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] MISREPRESENT NP2 Note: Agent can exist as a group.
sense.examples: He misrepresented his credentials to the hiring committee. The company misrepresented the rechargeable battery used in its iPod.
